description: Keep your dog warm and stylish this winter with our custom coat fitting service. We offer personalized fittings for all breeds, choosing from a variety of materials like fleece, wool, and waterproof fabrics. Our service includes measuring, fitting, and suggesting the best winter outfit that ensures comfort, flexibility, and warmth during walks, playtime, or outdoor adventures.

Professional winter grooming service including a gentle bath with moisturizing winter-safe shampoo, paw balm treatment, nail trimming, ear cleaning, and fur conditioning. This service ensures your dog stays healthy, comfortable, and ready to enjoy snowy or icy outdoor environments without paw irritation or dryness.

Ensure your pet enjoys cozy and insulated sleep during cold nights. Our team delivers and sets up high-quality winter beds, including memory foam options, heated mats, and soft blankets. We arrange the bed in the safest, most comfortable corner of your home, guaranteeing your pet a warm and restful sleep throughout the winter season.

Protect your dog's paws from harmful winter road salts, chemicals, and ice melts. Our professional paw cleaning service gently washes and moisturizes paws after every walk, removing irritants that could cause cracking, dryness, or infections. We also provide recommendations for paw balms and protective booties for extreme winter conditions.

Comprehensive winter health checkup for dogs to detect potential cold-related issues such as arthritis flare-ups, hypothermia risks, respiratory problems, and skin dryness. Includes full physical examination, blood tests, vaccination review, nutritional advice, and recommendations for protective clothing or supplements for winter wellness.

Rent fashionable and warm outfits for your dog for special events, photoshoots, parties, or winter strolls. Our collection includes sweaters, coats, scarves, boots, and full winter ensembles. Outfits are sanitized, high-quality, and comfortable to ensure your dog can enjoy the winter in style.

Professional setup of outdoor or garage-based heated water bowls to prevent freezing. Service includes electrical safety check, bowl placement, and a demonstration to ensure consistent access to fresh, unfrozen water, crucial for winter hydration.

A focused training session to help your dog comfortably wear and walk in protective booties. We use positive reinforcement techniques to make wearing boots a positive experience, preventing slips on ice and protecting paws from salt.

Customized dietary consultation and meal plan designed for highly active or smaller dogs that burn extra calories to stay warm in cold weather. Focuses on balanced fats and proteins to support energy levels and maintain a healthy weight.

Before your dog's scheduled walk, we shovel and clear a path in deep snow around your yard or designated area, making it easier and safer for shorter-legged dogs to navigate and relieve themselves without getting buried.

An essential class for pet owners covering the signs of hypothermia and frostbite, immediate first-aid response, and best practices for safe cold-weather exercise and outdoor time. Includes a kit of necessary emergency supplies.

A luxurious spa treatment to combat dry, brittle winter fur. Includes a warm oil mask application, gentle massage, and a deep-conditioning wrap to restore moisture, shine, and prevent static and breakage during the dry months.

Access to a fully climate-controlled indoor arena with various agility obstacles (tunnels, jumps, weave poles) perfect for burning off pent-up winter energy without risking exposure to the cold or ice.

A supervised, safe sledding experience where your dog can pull a light-weight sled (skijoring style) or enjoy a ride down gentle slopes. Perfect for energetic medium to large breeds. Safety harness and equipment provided.

A self-heating, reflective thermal blanket that uses your pet's own body heat to provide extra warmth on cold floors or in their crate. Delivered with a seasonal toy and a small bag of comforting treats.

Fitted and custom-sized high-visibility booties designed with extra grip and waterproofing, specifically intended to protect paws from road de-icing chemicals and sharp ice chunks. Includes an initial fitting session.

Targeted therapeutic massage for older dogs, focusing on stiff joints and cold-aggravated arthritis. Helps improve circulation, reduce pain, and increase mobility during the winter months. Performed by a certified canine therapist.

Full-day daycare focused entirely on supervised indoor play sessions. Ideal for extreme cold days when outdoor time is limited, ensuring your dog receives necessary exercise and socialization in a cozy, heated environment.

A professional photo session, either outdoors in a safe, snowy setting (weather permitting) or in a festive indoor studio. Includes two high-resolution digital images and a complimentary holiday-themed prop.

A specialized treatment using vet-approved, pet-safe essential oils (like Lavender or Chamomile) mixed with moisturizing carriers to soothe dry, itchy, and flaky winter skin. Applied during a gentle, warm rinse.

On-demand service for clearing a small, contained area for your pet's bathroom breaks after heavy, unexpected snowfall. Ensures your pet can quickly and comfortably go outside without struggling through deep drifts.

A consultation with a certified pet nutritionist to evaluate your dog's needs and recommend specific supplements (like Omega-3s or probiotics) to strengthen their immune system during the demanding winter season.

Ensure visibility during darker winter walks. Includes fitting a comfortable, lightweight, high-visibility vest or harness with reflective strips and optional LED lights for maximum safety during early morning or late evening outings.

Monthly delivery of two complex puzzle toys or snuffle mats designed to keep your dog mentally stimulated and engaged indoors when outdoor exercise is limited by bad weather. Suitable for all size dogs.

Consultation and training to prepare your pet for winter travel, covering safe car restraint systems, packing emergency cold-weather kits, handling sudden stops on icy roads, and reducing travel anxiety during holiday trips.

Weekly delivery of slow-simmered, organic bone broth made specifically for dogs. Excellent for boosting hydration, supporting joint health, and adding a palatable, warm topper to dry winter meals. Available in chicken or beef.

A specialized home inspection focused on pet-related furnace and heating risks, including checking for carbon monoxide leaks, identifying safe distances from heating vents, and ensuring proper air filtration for pet dander.

A functional trim service specifically for long-haired breeds to clip fur shorter around the paws, legs, and belly. This prevents 'snowball mats' and excessive ice buildup, making post-walk cleanup much easier.

Delivery, assembly, and secure installation of an insulated, thermostatically controlled heated dog house. Includes running necessary extension cords safely and advising on the best placement for maximum wind protection.

Application of protective, vet-approved eye drops and instruction on how to use them to prevent the temporary condition known as 'snow blindness,' which can occur after prolonged exposure to bright sunlight reflecting off snow.

Specialized training session focusing on perfecting off-leash recall, particularly useful when dogs spend more time indoors or in enclosed, large spaces during winter. Ensures immediate response to commands for safety.

Design and fitting of a bespoke, hand-knitted holiday sweater or festive jumper for your dog. Choose colors, patterns, and personalized embroidery to ensure a perfect fit and high-quality, comfortable material.

Introductory coaching for activities like Canicross on snowshoes or basic recreational skijoring (dog pulling a person on skis). Teaches essential commands, safety protocols, and proper equipment use for fun winter sports.

A custom-made advent calendar or seasonal treat box containing 24 days of grain-free, all-natural dog biscuits and chews. Perfect for holiday gifting and providing high-value training rewards during the winter.

A moisturizing treatment focused on cleaning and hydrating dry, chapped skin around the muzzle, nose, and facial folds, which are often aggravated by cold wind and dry indoor heat. Includes a soothing steam treatment.

Pre-registration service guaranteeing 24/7 cold-weather emergency transport to the nearest veterinary hospital. Includes a heated, insulated carrier and dedicated driver, especially crucial for icy or heavily snowed-in roads.

Rental of a heavy-duty, insulated, pop-up shelter for use during winter hunting, camping, or ice-fishing trips. Provides a safe, windproof, and elevated resting space for your dog during cold outdoor activities.

A specialized behavioral class teaching your dog to find and stay in warm spots (like near a heater, under a blanket, or on a bed) on command. Useful for ensuring comfort and preventing cold exposure when left alone.

Check of your vehicle's tires, battery, and fluid levels for safe winter travel with pets. Also includes assembling a comprehensive pet-focused emergency kit for the car, including blankets, food, and first-aid supplies.

A fun, seasonal activity to create a ceramic or clay mold of your dog's paw print, perfect for hanging on a Christmas tree or displaying as a holiday keepsake. Includes all materials and firing/glazing.

Advanced first aid instruction for dealing with injuries unique to cold, remote environments, such as snow-related lacerations, severe frostbite, and deep-snow exhaustion. For owners who hike or hunt in winter.

Consultation and fitting for lightweight, breathable fleece or flannel pajamas designed to keep small or short-haired dogs warm overnight in cooler houses. Ensures a non-restrictive, comfortable fit for sleeping.

A personalized session to adjust your dog's diet and exercise regimen to prevent unhealthy weight gain during winter, when activity levels often decrease. Includes a body condition score assessment and suggested portion sizes.

Installation and maintenance consultation for a pet-safe humidifier in your main living space or near your dog's sleeping area. Helps alleviate dry skin, irritated noses, and respiratory issues caused by forced indoor heating.

An intense grooming session that uses specialized tools and high-velocity dryers to remove dead undercoat before the winter coat fully thickens. Reduces shedding indoors and prevents matting under winter coats/sweaters.
An interactive, online workshop teaching owners how to safely make fun, nutritious, frozen enrichment treats (like pupsicles and lick mats) using dog-friendly ingredients to keep pets busy indoors.

Professional fitting for a therapeutic anxiety vest, beneficial for dogs stressed by loud winter storms, high winds, or holiday fireworks. Ensures correct pressure for calming effect without restricting movement.

Specialized training for small breeds or older dogs to use an indoor potty system (grass patch or litter box) as an alternative during dangerously cold or snowy weather, ensuring they can relieve themselves comfortably.
Delivery of a 25-pound bag of veterinary-approved, propylene glycol-based ice melt that is safe for pet paws and ingestion, for owners who want to clear their own driveways and walkways responsibly.

Full-service planning for a dog-inclusive holiday party, including venue recommendations (pet-friendly), dog-safe catering menu creation, securing pet sitters for crowd control, and themed d√©cor setup.

A quick-dry application of a specialized, thick moisturizing barrier cream to protect sensitive areas like ear tips, paw pads, and tails from windburn and minor frostbite during extremely cold outdoor exposure.
